name: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by source of funds and selected industry: 2017
description: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by source of funds and selected industry: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_all_r_da
variableMeasured.unitText: Millions of dollars and percent share

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_companies_domestic
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others Companies Domestic

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_companies_foreignc
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others Companies Foreignc

variableMeasured.name: field_paid_for_by_others_all_other_organizationsd
variableMeasured.description: Paid For By Others All Other Organizationsd

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D. Industry classification was based on the dominant business code for domestic R&D performance, where available. For companies that did not report business codes, the classification used for sampling was assigned. This table excludes data for federally funded R&D centers.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, and U.S. Census Bureau, Business Research and Development Survey, 2017.Science and Engineering Indicators
